abstract: GoMo, as in “Go Mobile,” a campaign by Google to encourage businesses to offer mobile-friendly Web sites, is expanding to 25 other countries and redoubling its efforts in Mobile, Ala.
snippet: GoMo, as in “Go Mobile,” a campaign by Google to encourage businesses to offer mobile-friendly Web sites, is expanding to 25 other countries and redoubling its efforts in Mobile, Ala.
lead_paragraph: GoMo, with apologies to the Energizer Bunny, keeps going and going.
